name: JobHunt
0:
”Alexa, open Job Hunt and find jobs with skills”
”My Location is Chicago”
”My Skills are Android Java”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: job hunt
des:
New Release !!!

Get job posting in your email !!! 

<<< ACCOUNT LINKING OPTIONAL >>>

It's simple to configure. Just follow the 2 simple steps.

1. Say "Alexa, open Job Hunt and setup"
2. Now go to Amazon Alexa app in your smartphone and follow the instructions in Job Hunt Alexa card. 

https://s3.amazonaws.com/alexa-job-hunt/index.html

You can now save your preferred skills, location and email address. Your location and skills can be saved using the skill also.

Or 

Use the power of LinkedIn to enhance your Job Search by linking your LinkedIn account.

Features: 

 - Search Jobs based on location and skills. Your preferred location and skills is saved. You can update it either through Alexa or through website
 - Search Jobs near you based on LinkedIn profile (optional)
 - Browse through the jobs available
 - Know details about a job opportunity
 - Receive email about job postings
 - Job Details are saved in Amazon Alexa app as cards for future reference. 

Optional Account Linking: This skill uses LinkedIn authentication to get details like job position and current location. Skill does not store your personal information collected from LinkedIn.

Visit below link to update your location, skills and email address

https://s3.amazonaws.com/alexa-job-hunt/index.html

Website can be accessed easily from "Developer Privacy Policy" ↓↓↓
